quotes.quote: It is difficult to inspire others to accomplish what you haven't been willing to try.
What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.
People who cease to grow can't inspire others. Leadership begins with challenging oneself.
When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
Be the light in the darkness to inspire and to enlighten others.
Someone needs your actions to inspire his actions. Never forget, your little broken cake is someone's daily meal! Care to share you little cake!
As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend.
If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
Your success will shine as a light of hope and inspire numbers you cannot total.
Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
You have the power to motivate and inspire. Let your enthusiasm shine.
Your life is a message to the world make sure its inspiring.
Serving and attempting to inspire others is a responsibility, not a choice.
To be inspired is great, but to inspire is an honor.
It is my responsibility to do what inspires me, in order to inspire others to do what inspires them.
Love yourself. Be gentle, kind, respectful, sincere. If you carry that out, you might inspire others with that attitude.
Don't give to get. Give to inspire others to give.
It would be wonderful if I can inspire others, who are struggling to realize their dreams, to say 'if this country kid could do it, let me keep slogging away'.
What you do to-day that is worthwhile, inspires others to act at some future time.
First find the man in yourself if you will inspire manliness in others.
A true artist is not one who is inspired, but one who inspires others.
There's not another better feeling that you could have over being an inspiration to someone else. I love that feeling of inspiring other women.
Average leaders raise the bar on themselves; good leaders raise the bar for others; great leaders inspire others to raise their own bar.
When you talk, use words that inspire you and others.
Do more than just exist; create to inspire!
Find your voice and inspire others to find theirs.
It's nice when they say I inspire them, it inspires me.
If somebody can inspire me, it feels really special.
You can't inspire people if you are going to be uninspiring.
To be inspired is great, to inspire is incredible.
My mentors inspired and encourage to fulfill my highest potential.
Success isn't just about what you accomplish in your life; it's about what you inspire others to do.
I don't need to be inspired any longer, just supported.
Sometimes just being yourself can inspire others to be brave enough to be themselves too.
A leader isn't someone who forces others to make him stronger; a leader is someone willing to give his strength to others so that they may have the strength to stand on their own.
Hide yourself in God, so when a man wants to find you he will have to go there first.
Unleash the potential that is in another and you unleash the potential that is in you.
Greatness is inspiring others to be their best.
Always be there for others. Always inspire them with your dreams and hope, vision and mission, attitude and aptitude.
Be proud of the incredible person that you are... and become a rainbow in someone's cloudy day.
We all serve as a vessel to be messengers for one another. Are you sharing the messages you are inspired to speak? Someone is waiting to hear your words.
I want to inspire others by becoming an example and sharing my thoughts and actions.
What if one thing resonates with everybody, but it's not the same for anybody?

The stars of the night inspire you; and then you write poetry and inspire others; this time others create new things with the inspiration they get from you! You see, thousands of beauty are created with a simple inspiration!
When you do some good work and if it inspires others, then you have just created the ripple effect.
Hang on to people that inspire you. Do work that energises You.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life-think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
I always hope that my music can inspire someone, the same way other artists inspire me.
Through music, I think we can inspire each other.
My motivation is not to try to inspire, but rather to do things that inspire me and hopefully that will spread to others.
Don't be scared to fly high, 'cause it will inspire others.
You have to inspire others, solve problems, which means you have to leave your own problems at home.

Inspiring others to find their voices. None of us is born to hate. We're taught to. That's why we need heroes, to remind us that we are all meant to fight for truth and justice. To take a stand against fear and hate.
And I do try to inspire others to be everything they are capable of being. If this is sedition, then I am guilty.
That is why we all need heroes, to set a higher standard that others can aspire to.

It's not about being better, you know, or anything-anything like that. You know, it's about being inspired. And I'm inspired by everybody. I'm inspired by all kinds of people. You know, it's art to me. You know, and with art- it's just showing something that you've never seen before.
Inspiration, perhaps. How do we inspire ourselves to greatness when nothing less will do? How do we inspire everyone around us? I sometimes think it is by using the work of others.
We need inspiration Francois. Because in order to build our nation we must exceed our own expectations.
The eagle, soaring, clear-eyed, competitive, prepared to strike, but not a vulture. Noble, visionary, majestic, that people can believe in and be inspired by, that creates such a lift that it soars.
Never fear it, you'll see it through. / Hearts can inspire other hearts with their fire. / For the strong obey when a strong man shows them the way.
But will inspire others by his good example / You are being watched by the nation / And you should realize / That you, will satisfy it if you do good
Beautiful are the feet, of those who carry this gospel / Oh if you only knew, the things that they go through / Yet they still care / They inspire others to live / Beautiful they have beautiful feet
You used to inspire others with your way of thinking and speech  / People came from afar just to hear us teach
You inspire me to be better / You challenge me for the better
Steaming neon's in the rain / Diamonds down the memory drain / But you inspire me, fuel and fire me

I wrote these words: to inspire a change / (To inspire a change) / Yeah, anyone who's livin' life can relate to what I write cuz it's time for a change / Look / I'm tired of hiding the pain; I'm tryna smile again
Never let go of your plan, execute / So when you shoot, inspire everyone on the land / Never lose knowledge of yourself / For it may become risk to your health
His words left behind / to inspire and remind / —of those things that we still have to learn
Everything written to inspire / makes the old new again / In ways that only / the heart can feel / —and the spirit know
In sounds that may prevail; / Sounds that gentle thoughts inspire: / Though so exalted she / And I so lowly be / Tell her, such different notes make all thy harmony.
Though great teachers certainly do inspire, teaching is love twined with labor, and teachers themselves need inspiration.

By reaching out to others with the power and ability you've been given, you never know who you're helping and whose life you are creating and leaving an impact on as you encourage, motivate and inspire them, too.
Always AIM-Aspire, Inspire, and Motivate-in life for your goals and dreams as you follow your own visions and dreams to create a change.

Once we aspire to become who we want to be, then we inspire ourselves as we begin to realize the strengths we have which in turn inspires us to push ourselves to exceed our own limitations and to continue to rise above and go beyond.
Inspire someone with your story and/or through acts of kindness.
People who aspire to something need inspiration. So, aspire to inspire them and inspire yourself to aspire also.
Encouraging others, through words or actions helps to inspire and encourage you in return. You are helping others exactly the same time you are helping yourself.

Somehow, inspiring and encouraging others is quite invigorating. Positive acceptance and action that others take through your encouragement somehow renews your own resolve to continue on your journey.
To lead others, you need to motivate them; to motivate people, you need first to motivate yourself.
The visionary who cannot inspire is not a leader.
If you can't get motivated about your current role, then change to a role which does excite you, and where your excitement will motivate others.
When we seek to expand our influence and inspire others to find their voice, we move into the world of relationships.

For school leaders to effectively motivate, lead, and inspire others, they must get to know themselves first by using their intrapersonal intelligence and skills by structuring time daily for reflection and self-evaluation.
Good leaders need the ability to inspire and to nurture an inspiring workplace.
Leadership can happen--and is called for--from wherever they stand in the organization. They inspire others to inspire others, and in doing so, they help to build a culture of inspiration.
Inspiration, to me, is caring and being able to...trigger or support others in caring, all to a degree beyond what we had ever imagined possible.
What we have learned in sorrows helps inspire others.
Inspiration is given to inspire. We give what we receive.
We may need inspiration ourselves one hour, and be called upon to give inspiration to others the next.
The ability to inspire others does not necessarily require great physical strength or health.
Good deeds inspire remembrance in return.
Continue in such a work of inspiration for others, the world would take on a new appearance within less than twelve months.
Leading is doing. To lead, I must move forward.

Being inspirational is not same as having a charisma. Inspiring leaders understand that, in reality, they do not actually inspire others. Rather, they create an environment in which others can find their own inspiration.
Inspiring leadership is not soft and fluffy. It encompasses an honest an courageous approach to dealing with people.
I believe that we all have the power to inspire others and shape the world around us.
The way you see and think and act can inspire those around you in ways you may never know if you don't step out in action and begin sharing your mindset.
To empower others to share the messages that are within them in a way that meaningfully inspires , influences and impacts others.
We learn to inspire others by being inspired by others. Developing this ability requires that you pay attention to what moves other people and what other people want.
The word 'inspire' means to breathe into, to touch the spirit--the spirit being our life force, our breath.
We inspire as role models, in what we say and do and what they observe us doing.
Inspiring leadership rests on integrity, responsibility, compassion, and peace.
You can inspire people by consistently setting an example worthy of emulation.
You inspire people by being the type of person they would like to be.
The goals that we are striving for, the missions that we have in life, should challenge us to be more than we ever hoped to be. However, they should also inspire others to dream bigger.
